sql:
SELECT
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_current_price,
  SUM(cs.cs_ext_sales_price) AS itemrevenue,
  SUM(cs.cs_ext_sales_price) * 100 / SUM(SUM(cs.cs_ext_sales_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY i.i_class) AS revenueratio
FROM catalog_sales AS cs,
  item AS i,
  date_dim AS dd
WHERE
  cs.cs_item_sk = i.i_item_sk AND i.i_category IN ('Books', 'Shoes', 'Electronics') AND cs.cs_sold_date_sk = dd.d_date_sk AND dd.d_date BETWEEN CAST('1998-03-21' AS date) AND CAST('1998-04-20' AS date)
GROUP BY
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_current_price
ORDER BY
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  revenueratio
LIMIT 100;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(i dd cs)
 MergeJoin(dd cs)
 BitmapScan(i)
 IndexScan(dd)
 SeqScan(cs)
 Leading((i (dd cs))) */
